data.name: The name of the custom method cannot be empty.
data.value: Il nome del metodo custom non può essere vuoto.

data.name: The method needs to have at least one pass defined.
data.value: Il metodo richiede di avere almeno un passo definito.

data.name: The pass constant cannot be displayed as text because it contains invalid characters.
data.value: La costante di passo non può essere mostrata come testo perchè contiene caratteri non validi.

data.name: The pass constant must not be empty.
data.value: La costante di passo non deve essere vuota.

data.name: The input text is invalid for the current data type. Valid hexadecimal characters are the digits 0-9 and letters A-F
data.value: Il valore indicato non è valido per il tipo di dato. I caratteri esadecimali validi sono i numerii compresi fra 0 e 9 e le lettere fra A e F

data.name: Default Erasure Methods and PRNGs
data.value: Metodi di pulizia di default e PRNGs

data.name: An invalid erasure method was selected.
data.value: E' stato selezionato un metodo di pulizia non valido.

data.name: The custom erasure method can only comprise passes containing constant or random passes
data.value: Il metodo di pulizia custom può solo prevedere passi costanti oppure casuali

data.name: The First/last 16KB erasure method requires another erasure method to erase the file.\n\nThis must be set in the Plugin Settings dialog.
data.value: Il metodo di pulizia First/last 16KB richiede un altro metodo di pulizia per la cancellazione del file.\n\nQuesto deve essere indicato nelle impostazioni dell'estensione.

data.name: The program does not have the required permissions to erase the disk. Run the program as an administrator and retry the operation.
The program does not have the required permissions to erase the disk.
The partition table on the drive could not be erased.
The Drive erasure target requires a volume or physical drive selected for erasure.

drive Erases partitions, volumes or drives
 arguments:
 drive=\Device\Harddisk<index>
 drive=\.\PhysicalDrive<index>
 drive=\?\Volume<guid>
The selected erasure method is not supported for this erasure target.
Could not list the Alternate Data Streams for file {0} because the file is being used by another process. The file will not be erased.
file Erases the specified file\r\n argument: file=<path>
Could not erase files and subfolders in {0} because {1}
data.value: Impossibile pulire files e cartelle in {0} perchè {1}

data.name: The file {0} was not erased as the file does not exist.
The file {0} could not be erased because the file's permissions prevent access to the file.
data.value: Non è stato possibile pulire il file {0} perchè i permessi su di esso ne impediscono l'accesso.

data.name: The file {0} could not be erased because the file is currently in used by another application.
The file {0} could not be erased because the file was either compressed, encrypted or a sparse file.
The file {0} is a hard link or a symbolic link thus the contents of the file was not erased.
The file {0} was not erased because it was deleted before it could be erased.
The file {0} was not erased because the containing directory was deleted before it could be erased.
Could not force closure of file \"{0}\" {1}(locked by {0})
data.value: Impossibile forzare la chiusura del file \"{0}\" {1}(in uso da {0})

data.name: The folder {0} was not erased because the containing directory was deleted before it could be erased.
The folder {0} could not be deleted because the folder's permissions prevents the deletion of the folder.

dir Erases files and folders in the directory
 arguments: dir=<directory>[,-excludeMask][,+includeMask][,deleteIfEmpty[=true|false]]
 excludeMask A wildcard expression for files and folders to
 exclude.
 includeMask A wildcard expression for files and folders to
 include.
 The include mask is applied before the exclude mask.
 deleteIfEmpty Deletes the folder at the end of the erasure if it is
 empty. If this parameter is not specified, it defaults
 to true.
The path you selected is invalid.
data.value: Il percorso scelto non è valido

data.name: recyclebin Erases files and folders in the recycle bin
The destination directory cannot be within the source directory.
move Securely moves a file/directory to a new location\r\n arguments: move=<source>|<destination>
The program does not have the required permissions to erase the unused space on disk. Run the program as an administrator and retry the operation.
data.value: Il programma non ha i necessari permessi per pulire li spazio libero sul disco. Esegui il programma "as an administrator" e riprova l'operazione

data.name: The program does not have the required permissions to erase the unused space on disk.
data.value: Il programma non ha i necessari permessi per pulire li spazio libero sul disco.

data.name: This computer has had System Restore or Volume Shadow Copies enabled. This may allow copies of files stored on the disk to be recovered and pose a security concern.
data.value: Questo computer ha il System Restore o Volume Shadow Copies abilitato.Ciò permette il ripristino di file memorizzati sul disco anche se precedentemente puliti e ciò determina dei problemi di sicurezza.

data.name: The drive {0} has disk quotas active. This will prevent the complete erasure of unused space and may pose a security concern.
Old resident file system table files
Erasing unused directory structures...
data.value: Pulizia di struttura di cartelle inusate...

data.name:
unused Erases unused space in the volume.
 arguments: unused=<drive>[,clusterTips[=(true|false)]]
 clusterTips If specified, the drive's files will have their
 cluster tips erased. This parameter accepts a Boolean
 value (true/false) as an argument; if none is specified
 true is assumed.
Could not erase directory entries on the volume {0} because the volume is currently in use.
data.value: Impossibile pulire i puntamenti ai folder sul volume {0} perchè è attualmente in uso.

data.name: The folder {0} cannot be deleted as it is not empty.
data.value: La cartella {0} non può essere cancellata perhcè non è vuota.

data.name: The file {0} is currently in use and cannot be removed.
data.value: Il file {0} è attualmente in uso e non può essere rimosso.

data.name: Plausible deniability was selected, but no decoy files were found. The current file has been only replaced with random data.
data.value: E' stata selezionata una "Plausible deniability", but no decoy files were found. The current file has been only replaced with random data.

data.name: Could not erase cluster tips in {0} as the volume is not mounted.
data.value: Non sono stati puliti i cluster tips in {0} perchè il volumen non è montato.

data.name: {0} did not have its cluster tips erased because you do not have the required permissions to erase the file cluster tips.
data.value: Non sono stati puliti i cluster tips di {0} perchè non in possesso dei necessari permessi.

data.name: {0} did not have its cluster tips erased. The error returned was: {1}
data.value: Non sono stati puliti i cluster tips di {0}. L'errore ricevuto è: {1}

data.name: Files in {0} did not have their cluster tips erased because it is a hard link or a symbolic link.
data.value: Non sono stati puliti i cluster tips dei files in {0} perchè è un hard link oppure un symbolic link.

data.name: {0} did not have its cluster tips erased, because it is a system file
data.value: Non sono stati puliti i cluster tips di {0} perchè è un file di sistema.

data.name: {0} did not have its cluster tips erased because it is a hard link or a symbolic link.
data.value: Non sono stati puliti i cluster tips di {0} perchè è un hard link oppure un symbolic link.

data.name: {0} did not have its cluster tips erased because it is compressed, encrypted or a sparse file.
data.value: Non sono stati puliti i cluster tips di {0} perchè è compresso, crittato o distribuito.

data.name: {0} did not have its cluster tips erased because of the following error: {1}
data.value: Non sono stati puliti i cluster tips di {0} per il seguente errore: {1}

data.name: Files in {0} did not have its cluster tips erased because of the following error: {1}
